body:
Tested it also with go 1.6.3 on the same platform:

Same error:

panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

goroutine 1 [running]:
panic(0x53b3c0, 0xc8200120a0)

	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.6.3/libexec/src/cmd/go/pkg.go:1639 +0x13d8
